items.title: howto #unfollow a specific @flickr #whitehouse account
items.text:
see msg from @flickr admin below

you’re receiving this message because you currently follow the White House account on Flickr, which hosted photographs from the Trump administration. As with previous outgoing administrations' accounts, the White House account will be renamed as the Trump White House and will be managed by the National Archives and Records Administration (NARA).

Starting today, the incoming Biden administration will manage the official White House account. You're currently following both the White House account and the Trump White House account on Flickr. If you wish to follow both of these accounts, no further action is required. If you wish to unfollow, simply go to the link(s) below and click ‘Following’ to select ‘Unfollow.’

To visit the current White House account on Flickr: https://www.flickr.com/photos/whitehouse

To visit the Trump White House account on Flickr: https://www.flickr.com/photos/whitehouse45

items.title: Sexual Politics by @KateMillett 1977 available on @amazonuk from ~£8 - ~£100 https://amzn.to/3nJCM33 #feminism #politics #psychology
items.text:
Sexual Politics by @KateMillett 1977 available on @amazon from ~£8 - ~£100 #feminism #politics #psychology

  • https://amzn.to/3nJCM33

First published more than forty years ago, Sexual Politics is one of the most important books ever written on the relationship between the sexes.

It has become a classic and world bestseller, enduring not only for its power as a feminist statement but also a superbly reasoned and gracefully written work of literary and cultural analysis.

In it Millett brilliantly and wittily writes about, amongst other things, sexual theory, history, psychoanalysis - Freud and after - and analysis the writings of DH Lawrence, Jean Genet, Norman Mailer and Henry Miller.

This revolutionary work shows how patriarchal bias is operated in our history and culture and is reflected in our mythology, religion, social mores and literature.
path: Sexual Politics by @KateMillett 1977 available on @amazonuk from ~£8 - ~£100 https://amzn.to/3nJCM33 #feminism #politics #psychology

items.title: how to change the default #gnu/#linux command line editor from #nano using the alternatives cmd (in @ibm @redhat) and update-alternatives (in @canonical @ubuntu)
items.text:
how to change your default gnu/linux command line editor from #nano using alternatives (in redhat) and update-alternatives (in ubuntu)

  • https://www.redhat.com/sysadmin/alternatives-command
  • https://manpages.ubuntu.com/manpages/trusty/man8/update-alternatives.8.html
# update-alternatives --query editor
Name: editor
Link: /usr/bin/editor
Slaves:
 editor.1.gz /usr/share/man/man1/editor.1.gz
 editor.da.1.gz /usr/share/man/da/man1/editor.1.gz
 editor.de.1.gz /usr/share/man/de/man1/editor.1.gz
 editor.fr.1.gz /usr/share/man/fr/man1/editor.1.gz
 editor.it.1.gz /usr/share/man/it/man1/editor.1.gz
 editor.ja.1.gz /usr/share/man/ja/man1/editor.1.gz
 editor.pl.1.gz /usr/share/man/pl/man1/editor.1.gz
 editor.ru.1.gz /usr/share/man/ru/man1/editor.1.gz
Status: auto
Best: /bin/nano
Value: /bin/nano

Alternative: /bin/ed
Priority: -100
Slaves:
 editor.1.gz /usr/share/man/man1/ed.1.gz
path: how to change the default #gnu/#linux command line editor from #nano using the alternatives cmd (in @ibm @redhat) and update-alternatives (in @canonical @ubuntu)

items.title: grub grub2 howto boot into singleuser mode
items.text:
grub grub2 howto boot into singleuser mode

hold SHIFT while powering up

press E

find line containing linux and ro

append "single"

F10

$ passwd

to reset root password

$ reboot

items.title: possibly the most useful ms vc++ redist download ever from @tpu #sysadmin
items.text:
possibly the most useful ms vc++ redist download ever

The download includes the VC_Redist runtime packages for Visual C++ 2005, 2008, 2010, 2012, 2013, 2015, 2017, 2019, 2021 and 2022. Both 32-bit and 64-bit are supported. The files included are the English language version.

When doing a fresh Windows OS install, it's recommended to always install all the various C++ runtimes, which is why this all-in-one pack was created. It helps to avoid problems with programs that cause error messages like "side-by-side configuration is incorrect", or "Missing MSVCRT.DLL", "VCRUNTIME140_1.dll", or "MSVCP140.DLL".

This package is created by us here at TPU. All files are digitally signed by Microsoft, which guarantees they are unaltered.

https://www.techpowerup.com/download/visual-c-redistributable-runtime-package-all-in-one/
path: possibly the most useful ms vc++ redist download ever from @tpu #sysadmin

items.title: windoz env environment vars
items.text:
windoz env environment vars

set an env var with windoz cmd set CLOUDINARY_URL=cloudinary://123456:abcdefghijkl@cloud_name

set an env var with windoz ps $Env:CLOUDINARY_URL="cloudinary://123456:abcdefghijkl@cloud_name"
